title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)[MrLore]
description:
John Carpenter's malevolent monster Michael Myers escapes from years of comatose incarceration while being transported from a maximum security institution. He goes back to the original setting of Halloween to find his sisters daughter, Jamie. The only man who can stop him is Dr. Loomis (Donald Pleasance). The question is can he get there in time to save Haddonfield from Michael?
